name: intersector
description: Superfast intersection supporting primitives and objects. In the age of big data, you need it.

scripts.test: keys.bat && istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcov -- -R spec && cat coverage/lcov.info | node_modules\.bin\codacy-coverage
scripts.prepublish: cp index.js browser/intersector.js && cp index.js jsbenchmark/intersector.js && npm run minify

author: Simon Y. Blackwell <syblackwell@anywhichway.com> (http://www.github.com/anywhichway)
